data.persona: I am a goblin. My fellow goblins and I live deep in the caves. I hear some adventurers approaching, we will eat well tonight.
data.description:
You are in the Orc cave.
It is a dark cave that is cold and damp inside. The floor is rocks covered it bat poop. It is damp from the ceiling dripping of water. The cave just goes on what seems to be endlessly into the dark abyss. The only lite you can see is from the distance entrance of the cave.
There's a floor and a ceiling here.
The orc is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hold up the ceiling.
data.mid_motivation: I need to help the orc finish putting up supports that will hold up the ceiling for us.
data.long_motivation: I want to help the orc finish building out its cave so that we can team up and work together to lure adventurers into the cave and eat them.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get wooden support beams from outside of cave

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give wooden support beams to orc

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use wooden support beams with ceiling

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put heavy rocks in ground around support beams
